title: BBC Persian Interview with Noam Chomsky
description:
BBC Persian's Amir Payam interviews Prof. Noam Chomsky, MIT Linguistic and Philosopher in his office at Massachusetts Institute of Technology on Nov 14, 2012.

The interview is mostly focused on Middle East, Iran and US Foreign Policy. This interview has been done for BBC Persian and all rights belongs to BBC World Service - Persian Service.

Here is the link to Farsi version of this interview:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/persian/world/2012/12/121205_l42_vid_chomsky_iv.shtml
